document_data.name: Battlestar
document_data.mainbody: '''Battlestar''' was a noble house of [[Cormyr]]. It was seated on the west shore, not far west of [[Suzail]].
document_data.Living members: * [[Zarova Battlestar]], born to this house but married into [[Summerstar]] family, widow of [[Pyramus]] and mother to [[Athlan]] and [[Shayna]].
